name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miguel Angel MARGARITO, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miguel Angel MARGARITO, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Lancaster County Court of Common Pleas dated October 21, 1998. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the Superior Court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph C. Madenspacher, Dist. Atty., Susan E. Moyer, Asst. Dist. Atty., District Attorney’s Office, for Com.
James J. Karl, Chief Public Defender, Samuel G. Encarnación, Asst. Public Defender, Public Defender’s Office, for Miguel Angel Margarito.
casebody.head_matter:
734 A.2d 1287
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Miguel Angel MARGARITO, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 3, 1999.
Decided Sept. 9, 1999.
Joseph C. Madenspacher, Dist. Atty., Susan E. Moyer, Asst. Dist. Atty., District Attorney’s Office, for Com.
James J. Karl, Chief Public Defender, Samuel G. Encarnación, Asst. Public Defender, Public Defender’s Office, for Miguel Angel Margarito.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
